summary: Part 1 of my RaceMenu Preset series, this mod adds a RaceMenu preset of a male Altmer named Casimir
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][font=Tahoma]Overview[/font][/b]
[/size]This is a simple mod, and as the name implies, it's just a RaceMenu preset of a male Altmer. Most Altmer in vanilla Skyrim look absolutely horrid. With this mod, you won't look nearly as grotesque as you used to!

Casimir is part 1 of my Racemenu Preset series, you can find the rest of the series on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41281005/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Profile[/url]

[font=Tahoma][b]Requirements[/b]
[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] [/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RaceMenu[/url] [/size]
[/list][/font]
[font=Tahoma][size=5][b]Installation
[/b][/size][/font]Simply unzip into your Skyrim directory (not the data folder) and you're good to go.

[b][font=Tahoma][size=5]Updates
[/size][/font][/b]This mod likely won't need updating, but in the event it does, I'll add to this section

v1.0 - Mod release

[font=Tahoma][size=5][b]Extras[/b][/size][/font]
[font=Arial][size=2]Mods used in screenshots[/size][/font]
[list]
[*][font=Arial][size=2]Racemenu[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=2]WICO Character overhaul[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=2]KS Hairdoos[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: UmbraManum
